misuses.description: Using a weak hashing algorithm like MD2 is vulnerable to hash collision attacks, which can lead to compromised data integrity. It is recommended to use a more robust hashing algorithm like SHA-256 or stronger.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more robust hashing algorithm like SHA-256 or stronger instead of MD2.

description: The code uses the MD2 hashing algorithm, which is a weak algorithm and vulnerable to hash collision attacks.
recommendation: Use a more robust hashing algorithm like SHA-256 or stronger instead of MD2.
